headline: It's Unofficially Summer. Time to Get Outside, and Talk With Decking Expert Trex CEO Bryan Fairbanks
summary: What Jony Ive and Sam Altman are cooking up for hardware with OpenAI and io.  How Home Depot and Lowe's are holding up until macro tailwinds return.  Motley Fool analysts Andy Cross and Sanmeet Deo caught up with Trex CEO Bryan Fairbanks to talk about the war on wood decks, how the company is handling tariffs, and why he expects business to boom as the macro picture clears up.
